sourcesContent:
<template>
    
  </template>
  
  <script setup>
  import { ref, onMounted } from 'vue';
  import { useRouter } from 'vue-router';
  import axios from 'axios';
  import { useStore } from 'vuex';
  
  const store = useStore();
  const router = useRouter();
  const factories = ref([]);
  const username = ref('');
  const name = ref('');
  const lastName = ref('');
  const gender = ref('');
  const token = store.state.token; // Get token from the store

  const payload = JSON.parse(atob(token.split('.')[1]));
  const userId = payload.userId;

  
  
  onMounted(() => {
    loadUser();
  });
  
  function loadUser() {
    axios.get(`http://localhost:3001/api/user/${userId}`)
      .then(response => {
        console.log('User fetched:', response.data);
        username.value = response.data[1];
        name.value = response.data[2];
        lastName.value = response.data[3];
        gender.value = response.data[4];
      })
      .catch(error => {
        console.error('There was an error fetching the factories!', error);
      });
  }
  

  </script>
  
  <style scoped>
  .register-form {
    max-width: 600px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 20px;
    background-color: #f5f5f5;
    border-radius: 10px;
    box-shadow: 0 0 10px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);
  }
  
  .register-form h2 {
    text-align: center;
    color: #4b3832;
    font-family: 'Arial', sans-serif;
    font-size: 2em;
    font-weight: bold;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    text-transform: uppercase; 
    font-style: italic;
  }
  
  .register-form div {
    margin-bottom: 15px;
  }
  
  .register-form label {
    display: block;
    margin-bottom: 5px;
    font-weight: bold;
  }
  
  .register-form input {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 8px;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border: 1px solid #ccc;
    border-radius: 5px;
  }
  
  .register-form button {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    padding: 10px;
    background-color: #42b983;
    color: white;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 5px;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-size: 1em;
  }
  
  .register-form button:hover {
    background-color: #3a9d70;
  }
  
  .error {
    color: red;
    font-size: 0.8em;
  }
  </style>
